description: Come explore the promise and possibility of blended learning, an approach to teaching and learning that takes the best of online learning, combines it with the best of face-to-face learning, and creates a way to customize learning by time, place, pace, and pathway.In this course, you will examine four different blended learning models, learn from others who have effectively implemented each of these models, and then have a chance to explore which of these models best fit the goals of your school and the needs of your learners. Expect a fast-paced, action-packed learning journey!
title: Adventures in Blended Learning
